title: PI - MORA
description: Raspberry JAM's are independently organised community events for people to come together to learn about digital making with Raspberry Pi. ENTC will undertake 3 Raspberry JAMs (Pi-MORA's) every academic year. Undertaking to teach Pi enthusiasts about the capabilities of the Raspberry Pi platform.

details.name: 23/24 - Event Name 1
details.description: This is a description for Event 1 in Year 2023/2024. It has multiple members and images. Yay!

details.name: 22/23 - Pi Mora 2.1 - Ethical Hacking Workshop
details.description: PiMora 2.1, organized by the Electronic Club and powered by Spark@UoM, took place on the 24th and 25th of September 2022. The event featured a two-day in-person session conducted by Mr. Yasiru Senarath, an undergraduate at the Department of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering, University of Moratuwa. It focused on the exciting and critical field of ethical hacking, providing both theoretical and practical insights. Day 1 was an introduction to ethical hacking, basic terminal commands, and foundational concepts in cybersecurity. Day 2 was a hands-on workshop covering hardware overviews, setting up Raspberry Pi devices, working with GPIOs, and defending against ARP attacks, including a demonstration of ARP attack and defense techniques. Missed PiMora 2.1? No worries! The full sessions are now available on YouTube: Day1 - https://bit.ly/3rJTDo1 , Day 2 - https://bit.ly/3SzRSWb

details.name: 22/23 - Pi Mora 2.2 - Computer Vision with Raspberry Pi
details.description: PiMora 2.2, organized by the Electronic Club of the University of Moratuwa and powered by Spark@UoM, was held on the 13th of December 2022. The session was led by Mr. Bimalka Piyaruwan, an undergraduate at the Department of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering, University of Moratuwa, who guided participants through the fascinating world of computer vision. During this session, participants learned about computer vision and how it works using Raspberry Pi. The workshop offered a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience and insights into this exciting field.
